Package Controller

Interface IController

All Known Implementing Classes:
GuestController, Menu, OrderController, ReservationController, RoomController
public interface IController
Represents an interface of controller Required to implement CRUD
Since:
2022-04-17
Version:
1.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void create​(java.lang.Object entities)
    All controller have a create function, which will take in the object and ultimately add it to a database
    void delete​(java.lang.Object entities)
    All controller have a delete function, which will remove object entity from the datebase
    void read()
    All controller have a read function
    void update​(java.lang.Object entities, int choice, java.lang.String value)
    All controller have a update function, Take and object entity in based on user choice update with user input

  • Method Details

    • create

      void create​(java.lang.Object entities)
      All controller have a create function, which will take in the object and ultimately add it to a database
      Parameters:
      entities - Declared as object to allow different entities to be pass in

    • read

      void read()
      All controller have a read function

    • delete

      void delete​(java.lang.Object entities)
      All controller have a delete function, which will remove object entity from the datebase
      Parameters:
      entities - Declared as object to allow different entities to be pass in

    • update

      void update​(java.lang.Object entities, int choice, java.lang.String value)
      All controller have a update function, Take and object entity in based on user choice update with user input
      Parameters:
      entities - Declared as object to allow different entities to be pass in
      choice - User choice
      value - User input value
